attributes.action: Declare BLA(Baluchistan Libration Army) a terrorist organisation.
attributes.additional_details:
Since 2000, BLA (Baluchistan Libration Army) is involved in countless terrorist acts and spreading chaos by destroying buildings, transmission lines, gas and oil pipelines and killing innocent men, women and children in Baluchistan (Pakistan).
On the 15th June, 2013 BLA destroyed the historic Quaid E Azam residency in Quetta, Pakistan and killed one security officer.
Enough is enough! Countless lives have been lost due to this organization’s terrorist acts- no more. Let's call this 'party' what it really is, this is not a political party but a “terrorist organization”. We cannot let them spread more hate and fear; we cannot let them take countless more innocent lives.
Please sign this petition to declare BLA (Baluchistan Liberation Army) a terrorist organisation. We need as many people as possible to sign this so we can submit this to the House of Commons, UK.
